entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow changing to periods of light snow this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
